## Project Requirements - SmartLab Hospital Web Application

**Project Type**: Modern full-stack web application for hospital blood cell quality testing
**Frontend**: Next.js 14+ with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, React Hook Form
**Backend**: FastAPI with Python, SQLite/PostgreSQL database
**Features**:

- Authentication & role-based access control (Administrator, Supervisor, Analyst)
- CSV file processing and data analysis
- Z-Score calculations and automated grading system
- Statistical analysis and quality alerts
- PDF report generation
- Professional medical dashboard interface
- Real-time data visualization with charts
- Activity logging and audit trails
- Multi-file batch processing
- Modern, responsive UI suitable for hospital environments

## Technical Implementation

### Frontend Architecture

- **Next.js 15.5.4** with App Router architecture
- **TypeScript** for type safety throughout the application
- **Tailwind CSS** with custom medical theming and color palette
- **React Hook Form** for efficient form handling
- **Custom Components** for dashboard, authentication, and data visualization

### Data Processing Engine

- **Z-Score Analysis** - Statistical calculations for quality assessment
- **Five-tier Grading System** - Excellent, Good, Satisfactory, Unsatisfactory, Serious
- **CSV Processing** - Multi-file upload and batch processing capabilities
- **Quality Flags** - Automated alert system for concerning results
- **Reference Ranges** - Comprehensive blood parameter standards

### Report Generation

- **PDF Reports** - jsPDF-based comprehensive reporting system
- **Multiple Report Types** - Individual test reports, quality summaries, laboratory performance
- **Professional Formatting** - Medical-grade report layouts suitable for hospital use

### UI/UX Design

- **Medical-themed Interface** - Professional color scheme and styling
- **Responsive Design** - Works across desktop and tablet devices
- **Accessibility** - Clean, readable interface suitable for medical professionals
- **Demo Authentication** - Role-based access with Administrator, Supervisor, and Analyst roles

## Current Capabilities

The application currently provides:

1. **Professional Login Interface** - Medical-themed authentication with role-based demo accounts
2. **Comprehensive Dashboard** - Statistics, activity monitoring, and quality distribution visualization
3. **File Upload System** - Drag-and-drop CSV processing interface
4. **Data Analysis Engine** - Complete Z-Score calculations and quality grading
5. **Report Generation** - PDF reports for individual tests and quality analysis
6. **Quality Monitoring** - Real-time alerts and statistical analysis
7. **Medical UI Components** - Custom-styled components optimized for hospital environments

## Next Development Phase

Future enhancements will include:

- FastAPI backend integration for data persistence
- Real-time file processing and analysis
- Enhanced authentication and user management
- Advanced analytics and trend analysis

- HIPAA compliance features
